title: 旧约 - 箴言(Proverbs) - 第 2 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 箴言(Proverbs) -- 第 2 章 ( 本篇共有 31 章 )

lineList.en: My son, if thou wilt receive my words, and hide my commandments with thee;
lineList.cn: 我儿，你若领受我的言语，存记我得命令，

lineList.en: So that thou incline thine ear unto wisdom, and apply thine heart to understanding;
lineList.cn: 侧耳听智慧，专心求聪明。

lineList.en: Yea, if thou criest after knowledge, and liftest up thy voice for understanding;
lineList.cn: 呼求明哲，扬声求聪明，

lineList.en: If thou seekest her as silver, and searchest for her as for hid treasures;
lineList.cn: 寻梢他如寻梢银子，搜求他如搜求隐藏的珍宝，

lineList.en: Then shalt thou understand the fear of the LORD, and find the knowledge of God.
lineList.cn: 你就明白敬畏耶和华，得以认识神。

lineList.en: For the LORD giveth wisdom: out of his mouth cometh knowledge and understanding.
lineList.cn: 因为耶和华赐人智慧。知识和聪明，都由他口而出。

lineList.en: He layeth up sound wisdom for the righteous: he is a buckler to them that walk uprightly.
lineList.cn: 他给正直人存留真智慧，给行为纯正的人作盾牌。

lineList.en: He keepeth the paths of judgment, and preserveth the way of his saints.
lineList.cn: 为要保守公平人的路，护庇虔敬人的道。

lineList.en: Then shalt thou understand righteousness, and judgment, and equity; yea, every good path.
lineList.cn: 你也必明白仁义，公平，正直，一切的善道。

lineList.en: When wisdom entereth into thine heart, and knowledge is pleasant unto thy soul;
lineList.cn: 智慧必入你心。你的灵要以知识为美。

lineList.en: Discretion shall preserve thee, understanding shall keep thee:
lineList.cn: 谋略必护卫你。聪明必保守你。

lineList.en: To deliver thee from the way of the evil man, from the man that speaketh froward things;
lineList.cn: 要救你脱离恶道，（恶道或作恶人的道）脱离说乖谬话的人。

lineList.en: Who leave the paths of uprightness, to walk in the ways of darkness;
lineList.cn: 那等人舍弃正直的路，行走黑暗的道，

lineList.en: Who rejoice to do evil, and delight in the frowardness of the wicked;
lineList.cn: 喜欢作恶，喜爱恶人的乖僻。

lineList.en: Whose ways are crooked, and they froward in their paths:
lineList.cn: 在他们的道中弯曲，在他们的路上偏僻。

lineList.en: To deliver thee from the strange woman, even from the stranger which flattereth with her words;
lineList.cn: 智慧要救你拖离淫妇，就是那油嘴滑舌的外女。

lineList.en: Which forsaketh the guide of her youth, and forgetteth the covenant of her God.
lineList.cn: 他离弃幼年的配偶，忘了神的盟约。

lineList.en: For her house inclineth unto death, and her paths unto the dead.
lineList.cn: 他的家陷入死地，他的路偏向阴间。

lineList.en: None that go unto her return again, neither take they hold of the paths of life.
lineList.cn: 凡到他那里去的不得转回，也得不着生命的路。

lineList.en: That thou mayest walk in the way of good men, and keep the paths of the righteous.
lineList.cn: 智慧必使你行善人的道，守义人的路。

lineList.en: For the upright shall dwell in the land, and the perfect shall remain in it.
lineList.cn: 正直人必在世上居住。完全人必在地上存留。

lineList.en: But the wicked shall be cut off from the earth, and the transgressors shall be rooted out of it.
lineList.cn: 惟有恶人必然剪除。奸诈的必然拔出。
